subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Caron Butler scored 32 points and DeShawn Stevenson had 17 for the Wizards, who played without guard Gilbert Arenas, to beat the Cavaliers Wednesday night.
snippet: Caron Butler scored 32 points and DeShawn Stevenson had 17 for the Wizards, who played without guard Gilbert Arenas, to beat the Cavaliers Wednesday night.
